crossbow.name: Zhuge Liang's Crossbow 诸葛连弩
crossbow.title: With Zhuge Liang's Crossbow equipped, a player may attack as much as desired during their turn.

black-pommel.name: Black Pommel 青釭剑
black-pommel.title: With the Black Pommel equipped, a player ignores the armor of the target.

ice-sword.name: Ice Sword 寒冰剑
ice-sword.title: When an attack hits its target, the attacker holding Ice Sword has a choice. They can either damage the target or chose to remove two cards from the target.

gender-swords.name: Male and Female Twin Swords 雌雄双股剑
gender-swords.title: When a player holding Twin Swords attacks a target of the opposite gender, the player can force the target to make a choice. The target must either discard a hand card or the player to draw one.

green-dragon-blade.name: Green Dragon Blade 青龙偃月刀
green-dragon-blade.title: When a player has the Green Dragon Blade equipped and the target of their attack uses an escape, the attacker may attack the target again.

serpent-spear.name: Serpent Spear丈八蛇矛
serpent-spear.title: When an attack is desired, the player holding the Serpent Spear can decide to discard two hand cards to generate the attack.

axe.name: Stone Axe 贯石斧
axe.title: When the target of the player's attack escapes the attack, the player can then discard two other cards to cause the attack to hit.

longbow.name: Longbow 麒麟弓
longbow.title: When the player with the Longbow damages another player with an attack, they can discard an equipped horse of the target.

ancient-scimitar.name: Ancient Scimitar 古锭刀
ancient-scimitar.title: When the target of an attack receives damage and does not have any hand cards, the damage is increased by one.

fire-fan.name: Fire Fan 朱雀羽扇
fire-fan.title: With this equipped, a player may attack as much as desired during their turn.

silver-moon-lance.name: Silver Moon Lance 银月枪
silver-moon-lance.title: Whenever the wearer uses a black card outside of their turn, it is considered an attack on someone in their attacking range.

eight-trigrams.name: Eight Trigrams 八卦阵
eight-trigrams.title: Whenever an escape is needed, the wearer can perform a judgment. If it is red, the escape is considered to be provided.

black-shield.name: Black Shield 仁王盾
black-shield.title: Black attacks cannot hit the wearer.

wood-armor.name: Wood Armor 藤甲
wood-armor.title: While this is equipped, the wearer cannot be damaged by barbarians, hail of arrows, or non-elemental attacks. When receiving any fire damage however, the damage is increased by one.

silver-helmet.name: Silver Helmet 白银狮子
silver-helmet.title: While equipped, the wearer can be damaged at most one health per instance. Also, when the wearer loses this card from their equipment area, they regain one health.
